name: Alise in the lava cave
description:
Hi there :),

This is Alise, a lonley girl who went for a walk in the park with her parents,

when she fell into a big hole on the ground, she woke up at a lava cave,

trying to find her exit outside she has to survive against bosses, and lots of traps and mechanics,

my first indie game :), l hope you like it & share some feedback,

will have about 1:30 hours of enjoyable moments,

coming out fully at July 20th.

any feed-back / any low/big donation would be MUCH appreciated :),

It's my first game I've developed by myself, and I hope you'll like it!

Thanks!
